content: I'm looking for some tips on how to care for my Levi's jeans to make them last longer. I've been wearing them almost daily for a month now, and I want to keep them looking their best. By the way, I just wore a new white dress shirt to my cousin's wedding last weekend, and it looked great with my tuxedo - I ended up buying it for $40, which I thought was a bit pricey, but it was worth it.
